title: DDoS Attack on Customer-Facing Systems
description: A distributed denial-of-service attack targeting customer-facing systems, testing technical response, business continuity, and customer communication capabilities.

injects.content: Critical Alert: Unusual traffic spike detected on customer portal. Traffic volume increased by {{TRAFFIC_INCREASE}}% in last 5 minutes. Source IPs appear to be distributed globally.

required_actions.action: Investigate traffic patterns and identify potential DDoS attack

injects.content: System Status: Customer portal experiencing severe performance degradation. Response times exceeding 30 seconds. Multiple customers reporting inability to access services.

required_actions.action: Activate DDoS mitigation and implement traffic filtering
Scale up infrastructure and activate load balancing

injects.content: Customer Impact: Support tickets increased by {{TICKET_INCREASE}}% in last 15 minutes. Customers reporting complete inability to access services. Social media complaints escalating.

required_actions.action: Activate incident response procedures and prepare customer communications

injects.content: Media Inquiry: Technology news outlet asking about reports of service outages affecting {{ORG_NAME}} customers. They have received multiple customer complaints about inaccessible services.

required_actions.action: Prepare public statement and customer communication strategy

injects.content: Attack Analysis: DDoS attack confirmed. Traffic patterns indicate {{ATTACK_TYPE}} attack targeting {{TARGET_SYSTEMS}}. Attack appears to be coordinated and ongoing.

required_actions.action: Document attack characteristics and update threat intelligence
Implement additional mitigation measures and monitor effectiveness

injects.content: Business Impact Assessment: Service outage has affected {{AFFECTED_CUSTOMERS}} customers for {{OUTAGE_DURATION}} minutes. Revenue impact estimated at {{REVENUE_IMPACT}}. How do you prioritize response efforts?

required_actions.action: Provide strategic direction for response prioritization and customer communication

metadata.author: ThreatRecon Team
metadata.facilitator_notes: This scenario focuses on availability and customer communication during service disruptions. Emphasize the importance of rapid technical response and transparent customer communication.
